body:
感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: The example page of the weex official website often hangs, can't open, especially at 4 or 5 in the afternoon ‘waiting for the response from dotwe.org~’

You may try http://editor.weex.io/, but I don't think this problem is about Apache Weex.

I will just close the issue.

![problem](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15995066/54980707-71faab80-4fe1-11e9-9914-358754c3b852.jpg)
![normal](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15995066/54980718-74f59c00-4fe1-11e9-851a-211fb23eb7d0.jpg)
Text tags occasionally render problems in bold and large fonts,I uploaded two pictures to show that there was a problem.Please don't close it. There is a high chance of recurrence in the project. I just set up a class selector like this. {
    "fontSize": "72",
    "color": "#FFFFFF",
    "fontWeight": "700"
  },

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: How does the recycle-list add a split line? Is it written directly in the layout file of the item?

You may try use a div as a divider, but Github issue is only for bug report and I don't think this is bug report. If you have feature request, you should ask in the [mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list).

I will just close the issue.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: The distance of the Android horizontal screen status translateX is not accurate. The difference between different models is different. Some are more than the settings, some are less than the settings, and no rules are found.

Please read the [document](https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/meta.htm) you will find all the distance is web based and `viewport:750px` related.

I will just close the issue.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: From the native page, first jump to a weex vertical screen, return, and then jump to a weex horizontal screen, the horizontal screen layout will appear to be a magnified version of the vertical screen. In turn, advanced horizontal screen, and then into the vertical screen, the vertical screen will appear to be a reduced version of the horizontal screen. It is speculated that after the first time the weex page is loaded, the layout of the frame will not be re-rendered.

Please follow the issue template and provide your runnable [demo](http://dotwe.org/vue).

I will just close the issue, feel free to reopen it with your demo.
As there is no updated of this thread, I will just close it.

As there is no updated, I will just close the issue.

Feel free to reopen it with a demo and test it in the latest version of Weex.

As this issue is not updated for a month, I will just close.

Feel free to reopen it if you have further questions.

As this issue is not updated almost a month, I will just close it.

Feel free to reopen it with a [runnable demo](http://dotwe.org/vue/9b990bf01a12497d0338ef0b997aff1d).
可以在WeexSDK.xcconfig文件里的USER_HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS变量加上weex的路径，比如USER_HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS =/Users/jianhan/Documents/Work/Code/WeexProject/weex/weex_core/Source

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Android 0.20.0.1 component extension set custom properties, some properties can not respond to the update data, can only be obtained when the component is initialized, hit a breakpoint in android studio, did not go to the breakpoint.

If I am right, the index in your java code is String, but this is not true in your JS code. 

You can override `component.setProperty(String key, Object param)` to solve the problem.

Ref [WXText](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/5a52f042acd357d763d76c88a5a993e9c33e43ad/android/sdk/src/main/java/com/taobao/weex/ui/component/WXText.java#L136
) for detail.

What's your point, I can't get you.

Could please update the code format and we can discuss based on code snippet.
Duplicate of #2246

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Error value type returned by Weex Devtools Android Module function in 0.20.3.0-beta environment

I think this is a bug about dev-tool, you should ask it in the [weex-toolkit](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit), not this repos.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Unable to debug, the interface loading is blank, report call [WEEX_CALL_JAVASCRIPT] error: jsframework has no such ap, no debugging, directly run APP is OK, then the native console reports the following error

I think this is a bug about dev-tool, you should ask it in the [weex-toolkit](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit), not this repos.

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: Weed sdk problem under branch 0.20.3.0-beta

Again, I think this is a bug about dev-tool, you should ask it in the [weex-toolkit](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit), not this repos.

But as you discussion happened here for a while, I think you could continue this time, but ask question about dev-tool in [weex-toolkit](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-toolkit) next time.

Thanks

@YorkShen thanks，This problem has been troubling me for a long time and never resolved，I'll keep watching

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: The process of weex page switching will occasionally appear page switching animation, so I took a video, the video address is as follows
Http://demo.seapi.cn:8040/weex/video.mp4
To rule out other reasons, I just created a new weex project using npm.
The version number of npm is as follows
Rev-192: awesome-app huguangyu$ npm -v
4.6.1
Rev-192: awesome-app huguangyu$ weex -v
   V1.3.11
 - weexpack : v1.0.18
 - weex-debugger : v1.0.5
 - weex-builder : v0.4.0
 - weex-previewer : v1.5.1
iOS projects are also newly added using weex platform add ios
The content of the page is also quite simple. The demo page you provided adds a jump. Use navigator to tune to another page.
The pages are very simple, there is nothing else, just a single save from one page Use your navigator tool to jump to another page
After running on the mobile phone, my operation is very simple, that is, I keep clicking and adjusting and then returning, repeating, repeating, this time may be very long, and this problem may occur soon, so it is a probability. event.
I uploaded the entire project to github
https://github.com/ErHu1993/Weex-Problem
This problem has been bothering me for a long time, I have never known how to solve it, I hope to successfully feedback to you to develop, thank you

As I can't download every project I met, could please provide a log?

As this thread is not updated for a month, I will just close it.

Feel free to reopen it with a demo.

@fanlvwen 这个包在我手机上运行是正常可用的，调试功能也是正常的，并没有发现你所说的报错：

> js-framework.js:1call [WEEX_CALL_JAVASCRIPT] error: jsframework has no such api

你的页面代码是否有什么特殊的处理？

你试下不通过导航栏输入，而是直接扫码打开页面的方式试一下

代码是分支下载下来的源码，整份代码只改了

`compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.20.3.0-beta'
compile 'com.taobao.android:weex_inspector:20.20.3.0-beta'`

这么说那问题应该出在weex debug examples这里，或者说是我本地环境问题，能告诉我你的环境配置吗？ 包括node，npm，weex版本等
你这边通过导航栏输入地址：xxx/weex/vue/index.js，app打开的首页是一个demo的list对吧，点击cell能正确跳转吗？
@erha19 或者能麻烦你辛苦做一份开启js debug的操作流程吗，是在这个问题卡住我很久了，就差这debug临门一脚始终过不去。。。官方文档我看了几十遍了真的，对于开启了js debug之后如何操作表述不是很清楚。用之前的devtool是完全没问题的

If `autoBitmapRecycle:false` doesn't solve your question, I think you could rewrite the [imageAdatper](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/29c3c80d3e03fd913716ec803c2244b946521dcf/android/commons/src/main/java/com/alibaba/weex/commons/adapter/ImageAdapter.java) and make a memory cache of the image using Picasso, Fresco or any other image library you like
@erha19 我也有同样的问题

> 可以在WeexSDK.xcconfig文件里的USER_HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS变量加上weex的路径，比如USER_HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS =/Users/jianhan/Documents/Work/Code/WeexProject/weex/weex_core/Source

是用的pod自动引入的

@fanlvwen @ZhuSky 定位到问题了，这个是由于android上的WeexSDK 0.20.3.0-beta版本无法正确识别vue类型进入沙箱模式导致的，对应代码已修复，将会在下次release发布，最快两周内 @YorkShen 跟进

目前提供绕开这层验证的方式，及通过在url上指明`bundleType=vue`，如`http://0.0.0.0:8080/index.js?bundleType=vue`.

使用最新`weex-toolkit` 进行构建的用户可以通过升级 `@weex-cli/debug` 模块来绕开该问题。命令如下：

```
$ weex update @weex-cli/debug
```

@erha19 问题仍然存在

系统环境：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36951996/55056360-e47e9080-50a0-11e9-8178-0b1f16aa7b1b.png)

1. chrome打开js debug，导航栏输入 `http://192.168.2.236:8089/weex/vue/index.js?bundleType=vue`打开app首页的list demo：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36951996/55056665-b483bd00-50a1-11e9-88e4-ed44ccd2c407.png)

2. 点击app上Animation模块，跳转下一页，又加载了首页js，并且一直在loading：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36951996/55056760-04628400-50a2-11e9-9da9-d115353aeaec.png)

另外weex项目代码修改后保存，自动编译，再修改保存1-2次，app必现崩溃。
@ZhuSky 你升级后解决了吗？

@erha19 preview到chrome上再用app扫码预览吗？这样感觉并没有提升效率。
debug开启情况下，我刚才测试了一下，保存一处weex代码，app会收到很多次刷新广播，页面很容易就卡住了。

之前用devtool习惯了直接开启debug，真机调试chrome看日志包括网络请求。
还能不能在weex-cli/debug上面把原来devtool那套同时支持呢？

**### devtool那一套对于开发者来说 效率是最高的。**
@erha19 chrome上的“页面“->二维码  展示不全，高度不够

你是怎么调试的？
[https://weex.apache.org](url)参考这个调试的啊，你这个“怎么调试的” 让我怎么回答

我这边是
1 weex debug src -e index.vue 启动debug，chrome打开
2 app启动debug模式，chrome出现device list，点击inspector，开启了调试页面
3 app打开activity，里面
`

 mInstance.renderByUrl("trainList",  "http://192.168.2.188:8088/weex/ui/Cooperation.js", map, null, WXRenderStrategy.APPEND_ASYNC);

`

chrome就自动输出日志之类的了


你的步骤是咋样的？
基本一致
那同病相怜，新版weex-cli/debug不适合之前我们这样debug了，感觉内部编译方式全部变了
等等 新的sdk 吧

@YorkShen 这个问题为什么关了，并没有看到 "arm64-v8a"这个目录，只有v7a和arm等。你说的已经支持是什么意思呢？可以把v7a的so直接放到v8a目录？
You are using weex-toolkit, and it only happens when you enable weex toolkit. So, yes, I think there is maybe something wrong with weex-toolkit.

1. There is no `arm64-v8a` folders now, but as 64 bit CPU would always fallback to 32 bit if `arm64-v8a` doesn't exist, so there is no problem to run weex on a 64 bit CPU.
2. We are planning to add `arm64-v8a` folders for better performance, but no detail schedule yet.
3. According to [community guideline](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list), Github issues is only for bug report, you should discuss new features in mailing list.

@YorkShen Starting August 1, 2019, your apps published on Google Play will need to support 64-bit architectures. 64-bit CPUs deliver faster, richer experiences for your users. Adding a 64-bit version of your app provides performance improvements, makes way for future innovation, and sets you up for devices with 64-bit-only hardware. [https://developer.android.com/distribute/best-practices/develop/64-bit](url)

I think you should consider re-opening this. This is indeed a blocker for us. And About React Native,this issue had been started about two years ago. And about seventeen days ago, React Native  had released 0.59.0 version to  solve the 64 bits issue. And i also had sent an email to dev@weex.incubator.apache.org to feedback this issue. Looking forward to your Reply, Thanks.
@YorkShen googleplay 2019/8/1强制所有app对应的32位so必须相应提供64位。否则所有海外外发的app都无法在googleplay更新了。google通知这个消息很久了

**It's an expected behavior.** Please refer to the official document of the `ref` attribute: https://vuejs.org/v2/api/#ref

> The reference will be registered under the parent component’s $refs object. If used on a plain DOM element, the reference will be that element; if used on a child component, the reference will be component instance.

The value of `this.$refs.xxx` depends where the `ref="xxx"` is.

The `ref="demotwo"` is used on the weex element, so it contains the `this.$refs.demotwo.ref`.But the `ref="demo"` is used on the custom component of Vue, so the result of `this.$refs.demo` is a Vue component, not a weex element, it doesn't contains the `this.$refs.demo.ref` property.

By the way, the `this.$refs.xxx` could be Vue component, DOM element, Weex element, or an array of them, according to where you are using it. Moreover it could be changed at rendering time. In short, **it's platform sensitive and dynamic.** So always check the value before using it.
Does anybody fixed this bug？I use the weex_sdk(018)also has this problem...

> 初始化失败，之后再进行初始化，会不会一直

应该是 weex 还没初始化完，onException 里延时重试  render 可以解决，亲测有效
Merged, thanks very much.
Thanks

感谢你的反馈，Weex目前是隶属于Apache Software Foundation的项目，因此在Gtihub渠道我们鼓励使用英文反馈问题。下面我将使用Google Trasnlate将你的问题翻译成英语，并以英语回答。

> Question Description: There was already an issue before, but it was closed. This policy is google mandatory, starting at 2019/08/01, each 32-bit native so library must have a corresponding 64-bit, otherwise it is not possible to release updates All new apps and app updates that include native code are required to provide 64 -bit versions in addition to 32-bit versions when publishing to Google Play Given the time constraints, 64-bit support is no longer a feature, but a bug that will affect developers in the future, mainly to conduct business overseas, googleplay released App. I hope to provide a 64-bit native library as soon as possible.

Please subscribe [weex mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list) where this issue is already discussed.

FYI: As 64 bit support is in early stage, I can't give you a specified schedule yet. What I can tell you is that we will launch 64 bit support before 1st, August, 2019. Please subscribe [weex mailing list](https://weex.apache.org/guide/contribute/how-to-contribute.html#mailing-list), we will announce such features in mailing list. Github issue is only for bug report.

Please follow the issue template and provide a [demo](http://dotwe.org/vue).

I will close the issue, feel free to reopen it with your demo.
got it. thanks for the  feedback
The problem seems solved, thanks for your contribute.

你好，我这边也出现了该问题的，我看了一下，具体的报错是**lib*****.so” is 32-bit instead of 64-bit**；现在weex提供了armeabi 和armeabi-v7a两种架构的so包，但是没有提供arm64-v8a架构的so包，导致初始化失败。建议官方生成arm64-v8a架构的so包，供开发人员自主选择。使用的weex版本是0.20.3.0-beta
@Hanks10100
